effect.ruby_sapphire: Inflicts regular damage, then lowers the user’s Attack and Defense by one stage each.

flavor_text.ruby_sapphire: Boosts strength sharply, but lowers abilities.
flavor_text.emerald: Boosts strength sharply, but lowers abilities.
flavor_text.firered_leafgreen: A powerful attack, but it also lowers the user’s ATTACK and DEFENSE stats.
